Code Example: Swal.fire({ icon: 'success', title: 'Saved!', text: 'Your changes have been saved.' })
Best For: Form submissions CRUD operations success messages

Code Example: Swal.fire({ icon: 'error', title: 'Oops...', text: 'Something went wrong!' })
Best For: API errors validation failures system errors

Code Example: Swal.fire({ icon: 'warning', title: 'Are you sure?', text: 'This action cannot be undone!' })
Best For: Risky actions data loss warnings important notices

Code Example: Swal.fire({ icon: 'info', title: 'Information', text: 'Please read the terms and conditions.' })
Best For: Tips help messages informational notices

Code Example: Swal.fire({ icon: 'question', title: 'Are you ready?', text: 'Do you want to proceed?' })
Best For: User confirmations yes/no questions decision points

Code Example: Swal.fire({ title: 'Delete this item?', text: 'You won't be able to revert this!', icon: 'warning', showCancelButton: true, confirmButtonColor: '#d33', confirmButtonText: 'Yes delete it!' })
Best For: Destructive actions delete operations irreversible changes

Code Example: Swal.fire({ title: 'Confirm Action', text: 'Do you want to proceed?', icon: 'question', showCancelButton: true, confirmButtonText: 'Yes proceed', cancelButtonText: 'Cancel' })
Best For: Any confirmation dialog yes/no decisions user consent

Code Example: Swal.fire({ toast: true, position: 'top-end', icon: 'success', title: 'Saved successfully', showConfirmButton: false, timer: 3000, timerProgressBar: true })
Best For: Background actions quick feedback non-critical success

Code Example: Swal.fire({ toast: true, position: 'top-end', icon: 'error', title: 'Failed to save', showConfirmButton: false, timer: 3000, timerProgressBar: true })
Best For: Background errors quick notifications non-blocking alerts

Code Example: Swal.fire({ toast: true, position: 'top-end', icon: 'info', title: 'New update available', showConfirmButton: false, timer: 3000, timerProgressBar: true })
Best For: Non-critical updates tips hints background info

Code Example: Swal.fire({ title: 'Enter your name', input: 'text', inputLabel: 'Your name', inputPlaceholder: 'John Doe', showCancelButton: true })
Best For: User input forms text entry prompt dialogs

Code Example: Swal.fire({ title: 'Enter your email', input: 'email', inputLabel: 'Email address', inputPlaceholder: 'user@example.com', showCancelButton: true })
Best For: Email collection contact forms subscription

Code Example: Swal.fire({ title: 'Enter description', input: 'textarea', inputLabel: 'Description', inputPlaceholder: 'Type here...', showCancelButton: true })
Best For: Comments feedback long text descriptions

Code Example: Swal.fire({ title: 'Select category', input: 'select', inputOptions: { 'Option 1': 'Option 1', 'Option 2': 'Option 2' }, showCancelButton: true })
Best For: Category selection option picker dropdown choices

Code Example: Swal.fire({ title: 'Choose one', input: 'radio', inputOptions: { 'yes': 'Yes', 'no': 'No' }, showCancelButton: true })
Best For: Single choice yes/no boolean selection

Code Example: Swal.fire({ title: 'Terms and Conditions', input: 'checkbox', inputValue: 0, inputPlaceholder: 'I agree to the terms', showCancelButton: true })
Best For: Terms agreement consent checkboxes policy acceptance

Code Example: Swal.fire({ title: 'Loading...', html: 'Please wait', allowOutsideClick: false, didOpen: () => { Swal.showLoading() } })
Best For: Async operations API calls processing states

Code Example: Swal.fire({ title: 'Auto close', text: 'This will close in 3 seconds', timer: 3000, timerProgressBar: true, showConfirmButton: false })
Best For: Temporary messages quick notifications timed alerts

Code Example: Swal.fire({ title: 'Custom HTML', html: 'Bold italic underline link' })"
Best For: Rich content formatted text custom layouts

Code Example: Swal.fire({ title: 'Image Alert', text: 'Here is your image', imageUrl: 'https://placeholder.com/300', imageWidth: 300, imageHeight: 200, imageAlt: 'Custom image' })
Best For: Photo preview image display media alerts

Code Example: Swal.mixin({ progressSteps: ['1', '2', '3'], confirmButtonText: 'Next >' }).queue([{ title: 'Step 1' }, { title: 'Step 2' }, { title: 'Step 3' }])
Best For: Wizards multi-step forms onboarding tutorials

Code Example: Swal.fire({ title: 'Choose action', showDenyButton: true, showCancelButton: true, confirmButtonText: 'Save', denyButtonText: 'Don't save' })
Best For: Multiple actions complex decisions tri-state choices

Code Example: Swal.fire({ title: 'Styled Alert', icon: 'success', background: '#f0f0f0', color: '#333', confirmButtonColor: '#3085d6', cancelButtonColor: '#d33' })
Best For: Branded alerts themed dialogs custom design

Code Example: Swal.fire({ toast: true, position: 'bottom-end', icon: 'info', title: 'Message', showConfirmButton: false, timer: 3000 })
Best For: Mobile-friendly bottom notifications alternative placement

Code Example: Swal.fire({ title: 'Enter email', input: 'email', inputValidator: (value) => { if (!value) { return 'You need to write something!' } }, showCancelButton: true })
Best For: Required fields validated input form validation
